channel.title: Lo-Fi Python - Google Sheets, data optimization,

item.title: Strategies for Speeding Up a Google Sheet
item.description: Recently I had a Google Sheet bogged down so much, Google prompted me to fix it from consuming too many resources in my browser. So, I pondered how to speed up my Google Sheet and made a short list of ideas. I included some ideas from a great article from â€¦
item.dc:creator: lofipython
